channel.title: 2 basic questions - please help!
channel.description: Ok first question - how do i add sounds on a 317, I already made a public void for the sounds for - whip etc. but ummm.. I mean when you go to lumbridge you hear that lumbridge song and falador, varrock etc. and when u load client the jingle song loads.... I've tried to do that but i keep getting errors... Second Question - How do i make a Object.cfg I'm trying to reduce my lagg and handle the login packet, i think it is less lagg to make a object.cfg that loads the objects rather than the makeglobalobject code... Thanks and btw I'm using Delta's Base...

item.title: 2 basic questions - please help!
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

Ok first question - how do i add sounds on a 317, I already made a public void for the sounds for - whip etc.
but ummm… I mean when you go to lumbridge you hear that lumbridge song and falador, varrock etc. and when u load client the jingle song loads… I’ve tried to do that but i keep getting errors…
Second Question - How do i make a Object.cfg
I’m trying to reduce my lagg and handle the login packet, i think it is less lagg to make a object.cfg that loads the objects rather than the makeglobalobject code…
Thanks
and btw I’m using Delta’s Base…
